attributes.action: EVERY PERSON AGAINST TRNC (TURKISH REPUBLIC OF NORTHEN CYRPUS)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THIS PETITION IS ABOUT PEOPPLE AGAINST TURKISH CYPRIOTZ TO STAND UP FOR THIS PETITIONNN PLEASE PUT UR NAME BY THIS PETITITONN AND SAY HOW U FEELL !! DONT LET PEOPLE KEEP YOUR WORDS INSIDE U 

YOURS SINCERLEY BLU EYZ !!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
